titleStmt.title: The Kings Maiesties answer to a late petition presented unto him by the hands of Mr. Alexander Henderson, from the commissioners of the Generall Assemblie of the Kirk of Scotland with their humble remonstrance and renewed petition to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie, from their meeting at Edinburgh, June 2, 1643.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Ker, A.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

notesStmt.note: "To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, the humble remonstrance and renewed petition of the commissioners ... " (p. 13-30) signed: A. Ker.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
